code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ImageLoader(){const[currentImage,setCurrentImage]=useState(null);const loadRandomImage=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/local-images');if(response.ok){setCurrentImage(response.url+'?'+new Date().getTime());}else{console.error('error loading image');}}catch(error){console.error('error:',error);}};useEffect(()=>{loadRandomImage();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"random image loader nya~ :3"}),currentImage?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:currentImage,alt:"random from cursed cat central",style:styles.image}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"loading image..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:loadRandomImage,style:styles.button,children:"load new image"})]});}const styles={image:{maxWidth:'90%',borderRadius:'15px',margin:'10px 0',boxShadow:'0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)'},button:{backgroundColor:'#ff66b3',color:'#fff',border:'none',borderRadius:'10px',padding:'10px 20px',cursor:'pointer',fontSize:'1em',transition:'background-color 0.3s'}};export default ImageLoader;
